text: @ScottAdamsSays @realDonaldTrump @TheConWom Ahh.. the snake oil salesman is changing his elixir. Adding essence of zinc... Now this will be a drink that immediately cures the #Covid19. Trust me. We have a 2 for 1 special going today. Step on up and get your elixir today. These 100,000 deaths aren’t helping my re-election. https://t.co/o7FQ7TpF9m
